name: ICRESG 2018 : 2018 3rd International Conference on Renewable Energy and Smart Grid
content: ‚óèPublication and Indexing All the accepted papers will be published on Conference Proceeding (Online Publish), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, IET and other academical databases. Selected papers with great extension will be recommended to publish in international journals.
